TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OpenPgpContext extends MimeKit.Cryptography.CryptographyContext

Docs.summary: An abstract OpenPGP cryptography context which can be used for PGP/MIME.
Docs.remarks: Generally speaking, applications should not use a directly, but rather via higher level APIs such as and .
